description: Mappings for shipment details and shipment tracking (Test)
name: Test logisticsMapping

cols.name: containernbr_
cols.value: if ( $.data.containerNbr[0] != '' ) then $.data.containerNbr[0]  else if ( $.data.containerNbr != '' ) then $.data.containerNbr  else ''

cols.name: hpeshipmentreference_
cols.value: if ( $.data.shipmentReference[0] != '' ) then $.data.shipmentReference[0]  else if ( $.data.shipmentReference != '' ) then $.data.shipmentReference  else ''

cols.name: elfclassifier_
cols.value: if ( ( concat( toLower( $.data.vendor ) , concat( '-', $.data.projectId )) == 'expeditors-1') ||      ( ( concat( toLower( $.data.vendor ) , concat( '-', $.data.projectId )) == 'schenker-WWPAN8') ||        ( concat( toLower( $.data.vendor ) , concat( '-', $.data.projectId )) == 'nippon-true') )    ) then 'ELF' else 'Non-ELF'

cols.name: shippingmode_
cols.value: if ( toLower( $.data.shippingMode ) != '') then $.data.shippingMode else if ( toLower( $.data.vendor ) == 'upsair') then 'air' else if ( toLower( $.data.vendor ) == 'ups') then 'parcel' else if ( toLower( $.data.vendor ) == 'dhlgf') then 'air' else if ( toLower( $.data.vendor ) == 'dhlexpress') then 'parcel' else 'unknown'

cols.name: hpeeventtype
cols.value: if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'expeditors') then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'VCB') then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'CPU') then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PUO') then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'FRD') then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'FND') then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'AGD') then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'TSF') then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'COB') then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'AFD') then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'CLR') then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'RLS') then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OFD') then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PUD') then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'DLV') then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'ADD') then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'ADU') then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'POD') then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'nippon') then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'BLASGN') then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PUP' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'CONSL' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'SCD1' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'ARV-L' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'CCLR-I' ) then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'WHOT-I' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'POD' ) then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'pegasus' ) then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'NEW') then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PUP' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'INT' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'ADA' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OFD' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'SCH' ) then 'Delivery Appointment '   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'DEL' ) then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'gw') then (   if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventType ) , 'RCVD FROM PRIOR HP CONTRACT.*' )) then 'Booked'   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventType ) , 'ARRIVAL AT HUB.*' )) then 'PickedUp'   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventType ) , 'EN ROUTE TO DESTINATION.*' )) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventType ) , 'EN ROUTE TO DELIVERY LOCATION.*' )) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventType ) , 'CUSTOMER APPOINTMENT REQUEST.*')) then 'Delivery Appointment '   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventType ) , 'FULLY DELIVERED TO CUSTOMER.*')) then 'Delivered'   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventType ) , 'FULLY DEL\. - DAMAGED.*' )) then 'Delivered'   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventType ) , 'DELIVERED.*' )) then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'panalpina') then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'AF' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'R1' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PU' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'X40' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'P1' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'X4D' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'K1C' ) then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'NS' ) then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'X6' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'D1' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'J1' ) then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'fedex') then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'OC' ) then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'OX' ) then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'PU' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'PX' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'OF' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'CC' ) then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'OD' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'DL' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'D' ) then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source) == 'schenker' ) then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'CBK' ) then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == '20' ) then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'PUP' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == '150' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'REW' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'DEP' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'RIH' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'CCD' ) then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'OFD' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == '850' ) then 'Delivery Appointment '   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'DIH' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == '900' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == '901' ) then 'POD'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'POD' ) then 'POD' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source) == 'dhlgf' ) then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'SHIPMENT ENTERED INTO SYSTEM  (LOCAL)' ) then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'ACTUAL PICKUP TIME  (LOCAL)' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'RECEIVED AT ORIGIN_ (LOCAL)' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'DEPARTED DHL STATION 1_ (LOCAL)') then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'ARRIVED FINAL DESTINATION  (LOCAL)') then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'IMPORT CUSTOMS ENTRY_ (LOCAL)') then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OUT FOR DELIVERY  (LOCAL)') then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'SHIPMENT DELIVERED  (LOCAL)') then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'dhlexpress' ) then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType) == 'PU') then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'AF' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'AR' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'CR' ) then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'WC' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OK' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'BR' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'DD' ) then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'upsair' ) then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'RECEIVED INTO UPS POSSESSION') then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'CLEARED CUSTOMS') then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OUT FOR DELIVERY') then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'DELIVERED') then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'ON HAND AT DESTINATION') then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'ups' ) then (   if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventDesc ), 'P .*' )) then 'PickedUp'   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventDesc ), 'D .*' )) then 'Delivered'   else if (matches( toUpper( $.data.eventDesc ), '.*DELIVERED.*' )) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'MP' ) then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'IP' ) then 'CustomsCleared'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OT' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OP' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'YP' ) then 'DepartedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OUT FOR DELIVERY TODAY' ) then 'Delivery Appointment' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'ceva' ) then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'HAWBCR' ) then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PICKUP' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OHO' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OHD' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OFD' ) then 'Delivery Appointment'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'DOCS2B' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'DOCS2BP' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'HWBCANCEL' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PODEXC' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PODPAR' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PODNR' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PODPARC' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PODP' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'TPNE' ) then 'Delivered'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'POD' ) then 'POD'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PODPC' ) then 'POD' else 'unknown' ) else if (toLower( $.header.source ) == 'crane' ) then (   if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'BKD' ) then 'Booked'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'PICKUP' ) then 'PickedUp'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'INTRNS-COB' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfOrigin'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OHD' ) then 'ArrivedPortOfDestination'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'OFD' ) then 'Delivery Appointment'   else if (toUpper( $.data.eventType ) == 'DELIVERED' ) then 'Delivered' else 'unknown' ) else 'unknown'
